page.title: 20LOCAL COLLEGE AND STUDIO
page.content: {Bojangles Studio}has over 50 different types of keepfit class. They have a studio at Ascot and Wexham. They have 700 members each. They have tap, ballet, karate, self defence classes a squash club, creche, sunbeds, dancewear shops and a hairdresser. 135 people work at the{Civil Service {College.}They have 250 bedrooms in the college. They have a little golf course and pool and lots of blackboards. They have some squash courts and lots of offices. They have 15 lecture theatres that can hold 50 or 60 people. The people who work at the Civil Service College say that the college is like our school but is for grown-ups.
